org.sql: SELECT 1 AS one FROM spree_users INNER JOIN spree_role_users ON spree_role_users.user_id = spree_users.id INNER JOIN spree_roles ON spree_roles.id = spree_role_users.role_id WHERE spree_roles.name = "$1" LIMIT 1

rewrites.sql: SELECT 1 AS one FROM spree_users INNER JOIN spree_role_users ON spree_role_users.user_id = spree_users.id LIMIT 1
